I have played this game for 277 hours , and i was not low skilled one ... Here are couple reasons why i would not recomend this game for new players . - The first reason is community . The average age of CS GO players is 14-16 , so if you are elder than 16 and still playing this game for thousand hours , perhaps you have serious problems (joke) . Low age = low intellengence , hence the feedback you gonna get won't be the most logical . (Actually , the most hate will be for this fact i think xD) -The second reason , in my humble opinion , are rules CS GO follows by . Couple years ago , this game was hardly breathing and almost dead . The finish shot was making this piece of sh...khm khm )... game free to play . Yeah , of coz free to play gamers were separated from those who bought the game , but nonetheless , free downloaders were allowed to play with them anyway . This situation created rapid jumps in amount of cheaters in the game . Plus , the locked door was open for everyone . What i mean ? Just a range of idiots per match increased as well as per cent of migration in USA reduced after building the wall .... Well , i think this two facts are major cause of this games death ... If you have other views or wanna add anything else , comments are free for discussions .

Great game. I've lost interest in playing it but I once enjoyed it enough to sink 155 hours into it at one point. Free To Play but the prime upgrade is a must if you're looking to play Competitive.
